data.trans: Chỉ trích, chế nhạo, giễu cợt
data.trans_hint: Họ luôn cố chế nhạo anh ấy.
data.en_hint: They are always trying to get at him.
data.content_game_1: They are always trying to Get at him.
data.answer_en_hint: They are always trying to Get at him.

data.trans: Đạt tới, đến được, lấy được, đến gần được, tìm ra
data.trans_hint: Các tệp đã bị khóa và anh ấy không thể lấy được chúng.
data.en_hint: The files are locked up and he can't get at them.
data.content_game_1: The files are locked up and he can't get at them.
data.answer_en_hint: The files are locked up and he can't get at them.

data.trans_hint: Bạn đến Heathrow khi nào vậy?
data.en_hint: What time did you get in Heathrow?
data.content_game_1: What time did you Get in Heathrow?
data.answer_en_hint: What time did you Get in Heathrow?

data.trans: Tiến bộ, thành công, xoay sở
data.trans_hint: Bậc cha mẹ luôn lo lắng về sự tiến bộ của con cái.
data.en_hint: Parents are always anxious for their children to get on.
data.content_game_1: Parents are always anxious for their children to Get on.
data.answer_en_hint: Parents are always anxious for their children to Get on.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy rất thân thiết với gia đình chủ nhà nên thường được họ cho đồ ăn.
data.en_hint: She really gets along with her landlord's family so she's often given food by them.
data.content_game_1: She really gets along with her landlord's family so she's often given food by them.
data.answer_en_hint: She really gets along with her landlord's family so she's often given food by them.

data.trans_hint: Tin tức về vụ bê bối tồi tệ của cô ta đã lan rộng khắp thành phố.
data.en_hint: The news of her terrible scandal has got around the whole city.
data.content_game_1: The news of her terrible scandal has got around the whole city.
data.answer_en_hint: The news of her terrible scandal has got around the whole city.

data.trans_hint: Tôi tình cờ phát hiện ra những bức thư tình của người yêu cũ gửi cho cậu bạn cùng phòng.
data.en_hint: I happened to get at my roommate's love letters from my ex.
data.content_game_1: I happened to get at my roommate's love letters from my ex.
data.answer_en_hint: I happened to get at my roommate's love letters from my ex.

data.trans: Có lời với ai (về chuyện gì)
data.trans_hint: Bạn nên có lời với cô giáo về việc vắng mặt vào buổi học trước.
data.en_hint: You should get onto your teacher about your absence in the previous session.
data.content_game_1: You should get onto your teacher about your absence in the previous session.
data.answer_en_hint: You should get onto your teacher about your absence in the previous session.

data.trans_hint: Tôi không biết chúng ta chuyển hướng nói sang chủ đề này như thế nào.
data.en_hint: I didn't know how we could get onto this topic.
data.content_game_1: I didn't know how we could get onto this topic.
data.answer_en_hint: I didn't know how we could get onto this topic.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đã cố né tránh vấn đề này nhưng họ vẫn cứ nói về nó.
data.en_hint: I tried to get round this problem but finally they still talked about it.
data.content_game_1: I tried to get round this problem but finally they still talked about it.
data.answer_en_hint: I tried to get round this problem but finally they still talked about it.

data.trans: Cuối cùng cũng làm được việc gì
data.trans_hint: Cuối cùng tôi cũng tìm một công việc mới sau một năm trời cân nhắc được mất.
data.en_hint: I got round to finding a new job after 1 year of weighing up the pros and cons.
data.content_game_1: I got round to finding a new job after 1 year of weighing up the pros and cons.
data.answer_en_hint: I got round to finding a new job after 1 year of weighing up the pros and cons.

data.trans_hint: Mẹ đã giúp tôi vượt qua giai đoạn ôn thi khó khăn bằng việc luôn bên cạnh mỗi khi tôi mệt mỏi.
data.en_hint: My mom got me through my hard time of studies for exams by always standing my side whenever I felt tired.
data.content_game_1: My mom got me through my hard time of studies for exams by always standing my side whenever I felt tired.
data.answer_en_hint: My mom got me through my hard time of studies for exams by always standing my side whenever I felt tired.

data.trans: Hoàn thành, kết thúc cái gì
data.trans_hint: Tôi hi vọng có thể sớm hoàn thành deadline này trước khi đi Sài Gòn vào tuần tới.
data.en_hint: I hope I can soon get this deadline over with before going to Saigon next week.
data.content_game_1: I hope I can soon get this deadline over with before going to Saigon next week.
data.answer_en_hint: I hope I can soon get this deadline over with before going to Saigon next week.
